content.description: Your open-source infrastructure automation platform. Manage your infrastructure as code with ease.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Manage your infrastructure projects. Each project represents a collection of stacks and resources.
projects.no_projects: No projects found. Create your first project to get started.

stacks.title: Stacks
stacks.description: Manage your infrastructure stacks. Stacks are the core unit of infrastructure management in Colonia.
stacks.no_stacks: No stacks found. Create your first stack to begin managing infrastructure.

environments.title: Environments
environments.description: Manage deployment environments for your projects. Define and organize different stages like development, staging, and production.
environments.no_environments: No environments found. Create your first environment to organize deployments.

contexts.title: Contexts
contexts.description: Manage shareable collections of environment variables. Contexts can be shared across multiple stacks to simplify configuration management.
contexts.no_contexts: No contexts found. Create your first context to share environment variables across stacks.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure your Colonia instance and manage your preferences.
settings.general_description: General configuration options will appear here.

ai_integration.title: AI Integration
ai_integration.configuration_description: AI integration configuration options will appear here.

infracost.title: Infracost
infracost.configuration_description: Infracost configuration options will appear here.

backend_storage.title: Backend Storage
backend_storage.description: Configure Backend Storage settings and options.
backend_storage.configuration_description: Backend Storage configuration options will appear here.

secrets_vault.title: Secrets Vault
secrets_vault.description: Configure Secrets Vault settings and options.
secrets_vault.configuration_description: Secrets Vault configuration options will appear here.

container_registry.title: Container Registry
container_registry.description: Configure Container Registry settings and options.
container_registry.configuration_description: Container Registry configuration options will appear here.

database_integration.title: Database Integration
database_integration.description: Configure Database Integration settings and options.
database_integration.configuration_description: Database Integration configuration options will appear here.

rabbitmq_integration.title: RabbitMQ Integration
rabbitmq_integration.description: Configure RabbitMQ Integration settings and options.
rabbitmq_integration.configuration_description: RabbitMQ Integration configuration options will appear here.

redis_integration.title: Redis Integration
redis_integration.description: Configure Redis Integration settings and options.
redis_integration.configuration_description: Redis Integration configuration options will appear here.

github_integration.title: GitHub Integration
github_integration.description: Configure GitHub Integration settings and options.
github_integration.configuration_description: GitHub Integration configuration options will appear here.

gitlab_integration.title: GitLab Integration
gitlab_integration.description: Configure GitLab Integration settings and options.

users.title: Users
users.description: Manage user accounts and permissions. Control access to your Colonia instance and projects.
users.no_users: No users found. Invite users to collaborate on your projects.

teams.title: Teams
teams.description: Manage teams and group permissions. Organize users into teams for efficient access control.
teams.no_teams: No teams found. Create teams to organize users and manage permissions.
